summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of staffing at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Assignment of correctional officers and staff to various posts and shifts at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019.
The roster details posts such as SHU (Special Housing Unit), Sally Port, Lobby Control, and Escort Officers, indicating standard prison operations.
Multiple entries show staff status changes (Sick Leave, Annual Leave) and shift adjustments, reflecting routine personnel management.
The document provides context about the facility's staffing levels and operations around the time Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.
